text: @StephenAtHome @DrLaPook Why was Dr. LaPook evasive in so many of his answers? Example: "When can we hug again?". Answer: "Hugging is good for you."  If viewers want evasion, we get that with Trump's press conferences. How about a good honest, "I don't know."? Unless this was satire it was #wastedtime
